data.message: Facebook, Please, please will change FB to let us change our settings for notifications for posts and for likes? I'm not fan of the LIKE Notifications at all! But I do want to receive notifications of new posts and comments. also can you please change in notification area where we can click on an x or something  to delete that Notification once we clicked and went the post and viewed it? then we won't have to scroll down search through all the notifications we have checked to find the notifications way down that  we have nor read yet? Thank you so much!

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback Pam! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1uw6Qi1 -Elissa
You're very welcome, Pam! Thanks again for the feedback. -Elissa
